net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser

Class BasicCsvLineParserExtended

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser.BaseCsvLineParser
      • net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser.BasicCsvLineParser
        • net.sf.JRecord.CsvParser.BasicCsvLineParserExtended
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICsvByteLineParser, ICsvCharLineParser

    public final class BasicCsvLineParserExtended
extends BasicCsvLineParser
    Basic CSV line parser. Basically
    - If the Field start with {Quote}; the fields is ended by {Quote}{Field-Seperator}
    - Otherwise the field ends with a {Field-Seperator}

    Warning - This class must be kept in sync with BasicCsvByteLineParserExtended class
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
    See Also:
    BasicCsvByteLineParserExtended
